title: Build the Service Catalog
content:
The Service Portal comprises the services and offerings defined in the Service Catalog. The services are categorized and offer various offerings.

  1. From the main menu, select Plan > Service Catalog > Catalog.

  2. In the Category pane, add a category or select an existing category.

    To add a category:

    1. Click Add. The New Category dialog box is displayed.

    2. Enter a Display label. The name of the category.

    3. Enter a Description. A description of the category.

    4. Select a Background image, Background color, and Image, and enter a Display order and URL, as required. For detailed information, see How to design category tiles for the Service Portal.

    5. Click Save.

    For more information about how to edit a category, including how to add entitlement rules, see How to edit the Service Catalog.

  3. In the Service Definition pane, add services to the selected category.
    1. Click Add. The New Service Definition dialog box is displayed.

    2. To define a new service, select Create New, and enter a name for the service.

      Alternatively, to select a service that's already defined in the Service Portfolio, select Choose from Service Portfolio, and in the name field, select a service from the list.

    3. Define a description for the service. This description should be what you want to display in the context of the Service Portal. For overview information, see Service definitions.

      A service becomes available in the Service Portal only when it reaches the operational metaphase of its workflow. For more information, see Service component workflow.

      For more information about how to edit a service definition, including how to add entitlement rules, see How to edit a service definition record.

  4. In the Offerings panel, add offerings under the selected service. To add an offering:
    1. Click Add. Note: If your tenant admin have enabled aggregation in Application Settings, to add an offering, click Add and then click Add an offering. The New Offering dialog box is displayed.
    2. Define a name and description for the offering.
    3. Select the offering type: Service, Support, HR Support, or Case.
    4. Activate the offering if desired.

    For more information about how to edit an offering, see How to create an offering.

    If your tenant admin have enabled aggregation in Application Settings, to add an aggregated offering:
    1. Click Add, and then click Add an aggregated offering. The New Aggregated Offering dialog box is displayed.
    2. Select a service provider, and then select a service from the provider.
    3. Define a display label for the offering.
    4. Activate the offering if desired.

    For more information about how to edit an offering, see the Create an aggregated offering section in How to create an offering.

  5. See the results.

    In the Service Portal the Catalog categories are displayed on the Home page.

    Clicking a category box displays its defined operational services, and subsequently all of each service's active offerings, as long as the user is included in the audience selected for the offering.
